cboCostEstimates.description: As reported by the House Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence on October 28, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5412, Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2022

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 170 (Wednesday, September 29, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SCHIFF:
H.R. 5412.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Among other powers, those vested in Congress pursuant to
Article I, Section 8 to:
Provide for the common defense and general welfare of the
United States;
Regulate commerce, and
Make all laws which shall be necessary and proper for
carrying into execution Congress's other powers as provided
under that Article.
[Page H5553]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 114.

title: Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2022
